references.reason: This paper introduces GPT-4, a large language model used in the proposed framework to provide object size priors, a crucial component for bounding box refinement.

references.paper_title: Omni3d: A large benchmark and model for 3d object detection in the wild
references.reason: This paper introduces Omni3D, a benchmark dataset used to evaluate the proposed model's performance in 3D object detection, providing context and a comparison basis.

references.paper_title: nuscenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: The nuScenes dataset, introduced in this paper, is one of the main datasets used to evaluate the proposed open-vocabulary 3D object detection framework, providing a large-scale, real-world benchmark.

references.paper_title: Are we ready for autonomous driving? the kitti vision benchmark suite
references.reason: The KITTI dataset, introduced in this paper, is another important dataset used for the evaluation of the proposed model, offering a standard benchmark for autonomous driving tasks.

references.paper_title: Unidepth: Universal monocular metric depth estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces Unidepth, a depth estimation model crucial for generating pseudo-LiDAR data, which is the foundation of the proposed automatic 3D labeling framework.
